file_content.text: See, friend Jedi? I am great hunter!
You claimed Dusk Shadow, but when Gwarror found me, I think, "do not tell that Qyzen has Jedi friend." This time, trap succeeds!
You used information your enemy didn't have; a powerful weapon. Good work.
Yes, it was very clever.
Wouldn't being captured by Gwarror erase your score?
Haven't you lost your points?
Had... had no score before. I am small. But I share glory of Gwarror's death!
Had... had no score before. I am small. But surely Scorekeeper smiles on such clever trap?
Surely a "great hunter" would have just attacked him at the first opportunity.
But you didn't kill him.
To attack was... was not part of trap!
Is all well. You called hunt, and Wookiee hunt was had. Scorekeeper provides.
Is all well. You gave chance to hunt Wookiee. Was Herald who denied, not you.
Friend Jedi, is more you should know. I saw Gwarror speaking on holo, to buy names of Trandoshan hunters.
But, was one of us on holo. Was Trandoshan, selling names to Gwarror.
A Trandoshan working with a Wookiee? That's unprecedented.
But your people are enemies.
Who was, Lek? Who sold brother hunters to Wookiee scum?
Did you recognize the Trandoshan you saw?
Who was it?
No face I know.
First you're some great tactician, now you spin another story.
You're making this up.
Is true, friend Jedi, I swear by Scorekeeper!
Gwarror thanked Trandoshan, called him "Veneb." But name is all I know.
This Veneb is traitor to us. Is judgment he must face.
Veneb must have had a pressing reason to sell his own people....
I wonder why he did it.
Credits is all reasons for some.
Did you get any idea of where Veneb might be, from the holo?
Lek, where can we find him?
No, friend Jedi. I saw face, heard treachery, but is all.
If you intend to find Veneb, you won't be hunting alone.
You'll have my help.
Thank you, Herald. Should finish what was started.
Hmm. To balance letting Wookiee go? Perhaps no, if he hunts again.
Is good thing you do. If you need clever trap for glorious victory, I will help for the asking.
Will be so, Lek. Go safe.
So, we hunt Veneb. Must return to ship, to begin.
Jedi? Why are Jedi here, Lek?
Oh. Qyzen Fess travels with wise and powerful Jedi. I no say?
Trandoshans. Worthless. Even as bait.
I take it this was all part of some plan.
Bait implies a trap.
If you want to attack someone, you can do better than an unarmed youngster.
Leave him be.
I didn't come for you.
Explain yourself, Wookiee.
What's going on?
I am Gwarror. I live by claiming Trandoshan heads. More than forty so far.
Lie. No Wookiee could kill so many.
I could kill hundred more, lizard! They were sick from "shko-yagu." Made it easy.
So you made Lek lure us here, thinking you could add Qyzen to your body count.
And Qyzen's next.
How did you know Qyzen's going through shko-yagu?
You knew of Qyzen's condition?
Talk of the Dusk Shadow's end. A Trandoshan hunter, the right age....
In other words, you wait until your prey is as weak as possible, then you strike.
You're a coward.
Killing hunters is crime against Scorekeeper's favored!
They skin Wookiees for sport! They deserve death!
You're killing Trandoshans who are honored and respected. If word gets out, the ones who retaliate won't be sick.
Do you want to start a war?
Let them come! We don't fear the lizards.
Your fellow Wookiees may not risk their lives and villages simply for your bloodlust.
Your people may disagree.
Hmm. Chieftains are stubborn old men. Slow to act.
All right, Jedi. Truce. If you and your lizard agree.
As long as the killing ends, I am content.
No more Trandoshan deaths.
Don't worry about us.
We shall.
If you can kill so many without a hint of remorse, you are broken beyond saving.
I've changed my mind. [Attack]
So you talk only to deceive?
Forty Trandoshans is a respectable number. Why keep risking your life, when you could be enjoying honors on Kashyyyk?
You've hunted enough. Retire.
Herald, he kills and kills, with trickery! To let go spits in Scorekeeper's face!
Even better.
We leave. Do not follow.
Fine, I tried. [Attack]
I have no wish to fight you, but if you attack Qyzen, I will retaliate.
Be warned: I'll defend Qyzen.
Then die with him!
I hope you're ready for the same fate as your victims.
So do you. [Attack]
Rahrr!
